call_title: Ergoversary Special - Weekly Update & AMA - July 1st

commitments.commitment: Release preparation with package updates and testing
commitments.quote: I'll get ready for the release. I'm going to update some packages, test it.

commitments.commitment: Voting for 6.0 to be started this week, as well as another emission reduction
commitments.quote: Well, this week we will have maybe a voting for 6.0 has been started, as well as emission reduction, another one.

commitments.commitment: Start building current jobs and do more in the coming weeks for sub-blocks
commitments.quote: And then, yeah, well, maybe we can start building current jobs and do more in the coming weeks.

commitments.commitment: Start injecting sub-blocks supporting mining nodes into public test nets
commitments.quote: So I think, yeah, well, we are pretty much on track in regards with starting injecting sub-blocks, supporting mining nodes into the public test nets from somewhat July, maybe like 15th to 25th, something like that.

commitments.commitment: Provide details on merge mined sidechains work in coming days
commitments.quote: So, well, actually, the work on merge mined sidechains already started, so we'll provide some details in the coming days.

commitments.commitment: Improve sub-blocks documentation in coming weeks
commitments.quote: So yeah, well, I will improve documentation in coming weeks.

open_questions.question: Questions about sub-blocks documentation that Shaya is organizing
open_questions.context: Shaya is reading sub-blocks documentation and organizing thoughts

reversals_or_updates.update: Release delayed due to Ethereum dependency issue with their latest hard fork
reversals_or_updates.reason: Had to coordinate and update dependencies related to Ethereum's latest hard fork
reversals_or_updates.speaker: Armeanio

key_facts.fact: When Bitcoin was six years old (2015), it was more raw with multi-sig support
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Sub-blocks DevNet update is doing quite well with load testing after fixes
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Every emission reduction is more aggressive than the previous one
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Work on Ergo started since autumn 2016, presented initial ideas in October 2016
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Protocol update regarding difficulty recalculation happened around 4.0.100x version
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Some nodes have been in the network since 2022
key_facts.speaker: kushti
